name: Weed Wackers: Bud Tycoon Firm
description:
Roll your way to a being a made man. Upgrade your strains to gain more revenue and take over. Unlock all of the strains!

-Earn as much as you can
-Upgrade your bills per click and auto clicks
-Don't miss the falling coins!
-Unlock all of the strains!
